thread.title: Illinois Burger King Wedding May Be First Sponsored by the Fast Food Chain
thread.title_full: Illinois Burger King Wedding May Be First Sponsored by the Fast Food Chain - ABC News

author: abcNEWS
title: Illinois Burger King Wedding May Be First Sponsored by the Fast Food Chain
text:
Burger popped the question and King said "yes." Ashley King and Joel Burger married in what may be the first wedding sponsored by Burger King . The two had met in the kindergarten in New Berlin, Illinois , and finally tied the knot on Friday. The couple and their bridal party don paper Burger King crowns in some photos. The groomsmen wore Burger King logos under their dress shirts.
Burger King Agrees to Sponsor Illinois Couple's Wedding Because of Their Name
Editor's Picks Ikea Gets Into the Business of Love With Virtual Weddings
Ikea Gets Into the Business of Love With Virtual Weddings
Burger, a grain inspector, proposed in October. They published an engagement announcement in their local newspaper the New Berlin Bee with a photo of the pair behind a Burger King sign as a joke.
Tasos Katopodis/Getty Images PHOTO: Ashley King and Joel Burger walk down the aisle after exchanging wedding vows, July 17, 2015, in Jacksonville, Ill.
Another newspaper, The State Journal-Register, picked up their story. Once Burger King caught wind of the tasty match, the company told them in April that they would pick up the wedding tab. Plus, the company provided for personalized yo-yos, Mason jars and Burger King crowns in gift bags.
Tasos Katopodis/Getty Images PHOTO: Burger King cufflinks are seen at the wedding of of Ashley King and Joel Burger, July 17, 2015, in Jacksonville, Ill.
Back in April, King declined to share with ABC News the details about the Burger King agreement. She did reveal that she could choose how the money was used. The couple had always planned a huge wedding for Jacksonville, Illinois, including 10 bridesmaids and 10 groomsmen.
A spokeswoman said she believes this is the first wedding sponsored by Burger King.
Tasos Katopodis/Getty Images PHOTO: General atmosphere at the wedding of Ashley King and Joel Burger, July 17, 2015, in Jacksonville, Ill.
"When we heard that Joel Burger and Ashley King were engaged, we knew it was going to be a once in a lifetime celebration," Burger King said in a YouTube video description. "Hereâ€™s to them, and the best, most unique, one-of-a-kind, delicious sounding last name combination in history."
Tasos Katopodis/Getty Images PHOTO:The groomsman wear hamburger inspired socks at the wedding of Ashley King and Joel Burger, July 17, 2015, in Jacksonville, Ill.
Tasos Katopodis/Getty Images PHOTO: The groomsmen display their Burger King t-shirts at the wedding of Ashley King and Joel Burger on July 17, 2015 in Jacksonville, Ill.
